referralCodeInfoMarib: Referral codes are reserved for users inside Marib Governorate. The app will verify that you are currently in Marib before accepting the code.
referralCodeInfoMarib_ar: Referral codes are only available to users inside Marib. The app will verify you are in Marib before accepting the code.
locationServicesDisabledMarib: Location services are turned off. Enable them so we can confirm you are within Marib Governorate.
locationServicesDisabledMarib_ar: Location services are turned off. Enable them so we can confirm you are in Marib.
locationPermissionDeniedMarib: We need your location to verify you are in Marib Governorate. Please grant location access to continue.
locationPermissionDeniedMarib_ar: We need your location to confirm you are inside Marib. Please allow location access to continue.
locationPermissionDeniedForeverMarib: Location access is permanently denied. Allow it from settings so we can verify you are in Marib Governorate.
locationPermissionDeniedForeverMarib_ar: Location permission is permanently denied. Enable it from settings so we can confirm you are in Marib.
errorGettingLocationMarib: We could not determine your location to confirm you are in Marib Governorate. Try again after checking your GPS.
errorGettingLocationMarib_ar: We could not detect your location to confirm you are in Marib. Try again after checking GPS.
locationPermissionScreenTitleMarib: Share your location for the best experience
locationPermissionScreenTitleMarib_ar: For the best experience, share your location
locationPermissionScreenBodyMarib: We need your live location to confirm you are currently in Marib Governorate and unlock local services.
locationPermissionScreenBodyMarib_ar: We need your current location to confirm you are in Marib and enable local services.
locationPermissionScreenPrivacyMarib: Your location is only used to verify your presence in Marib Governorate. It will never be shared without your consent.
locationPermissionScreenPrivacyMarib_ar: Your location is only used to confirm you are in Marib and will not be shared without your consent.
locationPermissionScreenDefaultLocationE: We couldn't use the default location. Please try again.

locationPermissionScreenEnableFromSettin: Allow location permissions from settings so we can confirm you're within Marib.
Turn on location permission from settings so we can verify you are inside Marib.

merchant_settings_subtitle: Manage every core setting for your store inside the app.

merchant_settings_payment_methods_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
merchant_settings_hours_helper: Set your weekly schedule. Orders outside availability roll to the next day at 09:00.

merchant_settings_help_body_one: Our team can verify your documents, connect payment channels, and configure reports.

accountVerificationWhyDescription: Verification adds credibility to your account and shows others you are the real owner, building buyer trust and reducing disputes.
accountVerificationCostDescription: Verification fees follow platform policy and include reviewing official documents, confirming ownership identity, and contacting you to validate activity.
accountVerificationReviewTimeline: Review usually takes 1 to 3 business days.
accountVerificationStepSubmitSubtitle: Upload your ID or commercial registration and fill in your store details.
accountVerificationStepReviewSubtitle: We verify the documents and match them with the account details.
accountVerificationStepBadgeSubtitle: The verification badge appears next to your name on listings and your seller page.

accountVerificationValidityHint: See your verification validity and expiry timeline.

accountVerificationHeroSubtitle: Prove your identity and boost customer trust with an official verification badge shown on every listing.
